11. The question of the necessity for adequate funds to provide
for a person, on a short term basis, to solicit members in
the category of industrial associates, sustaining and individual
members was referred to the permanent Finance Committee with
a request for recommendations.
The meeting adjourned at It: 10 p.ra.
Haskell Boyter, Secretary
June 25, 1958
Copied at MSB Headquarters 7/7/58
erne
CC: MSB Board
